Blackfang: Okay... let's see... Wow... this thing really is an 
antiquity! I'll try to bring it back online and search for a DNA form.

He pops a small panel on the side of the pod and taps some keys. The 
report comes in a few moments later, but slower than he expected.

Blackfang: The power seems depleted, but not completely. 
Surprisingly... it already scanned a mode. There has been damage to 
the protoform, but they have been repaired. My guess is that's what 
depleted the power source. I wonder if it will hold long enough to get 
the robot out safely...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> "Yeahhh....." 
> Hot Rod strugles, but pulls the pod from the rock, and lays it flat 
on the ground.
